column3: comment:"I have received this product as per specification and in good condition more then my expectation. Thanks to Daraz Team and Dawlance"}
column6: comment:"It came securely packed and was delivered fast.It looks really amazing. The bottom sheet screws were missing which I had to buy from the market. Its backside removable panel has a finishing issue it doesn't fully cover up the whole back and has 2-3 mm gaps. I had to call Dawlance my self for installation and checking.The Dawlance technician checked and installed it and did a test run."}
column10: delivered safely and in time. I really loved the experience of ordering something this expense online as I was scared first. Overall everything went great and I love the machine."}

column23: comment:"Machine is no doubt good and packed very carefully but i see few dents at the back of the machine when i opened the machine for installation

column25: There was no issue as I fear
column26: Machine is working totally fine after the installation.\nThanks to Dawlance team for their timely response
column27: will definitely order with them again."}
